name: sdbg
description: This project is designed to **recut** larger GIFs into multiple smaller **animated** GIFs sized for Elgatoâ€™s Stream Deck models, including **Stream Deck Mini**, **Stream Deck**, **Stream Deck Plus**, **Stream Deck Neo** and **Stream Deck XL**.
